description: The lion cage houses two majestic lions. Visitors can observe their regal beauty and learn about their behavior and conservation status.
The giraffe enclosure features three graceful giraffes. Guests can marvel at their long necks and observe their unique feeding habits.
The elephant enclosure is home to a single magnificent elephant. Visitors can witness its impressive size and strength while discovering interesting facts about this gentle giant.
In the tiger habitat, two powerful tigers roam. Guests can catch a glimpse of their agility and learn about the conservation efforts in place to protect these endangered creatures.
The penguin exhibit is home to a lively colony of ten penguins. Visitors can observe their playful antics and get a closer look at their unique adaptations to the cold environment.
